spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hood of Hungering Darkness

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 722,669 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 313,946.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 178,802 damage and granting them 1,299 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.5 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
